MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G20 postcode area of Glasgow. We are aware of multiple power cuts in your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers have arrived in the local area and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. When we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:45pm on Saturday, 20 March 2021
